about_the_game:
Savanna Story Diamond Edition - It is a non-linear visual novel with elements of drama. The action of the game takes place in 2012! Savannah is on the brink of war! The fate of Savannah is in your hands! Was inspired by the game Lioness Story(Maltakreuz,Goodsir,Maxim Garagulin). This edition features absolute 4k and HDR graphics, you will be instantly immersed in Savannah! This edition features absolute 4k and HDR graphics, you will be instantly immersed in Savannah! Benefits of Savanna Story Diamond Edition:
1) Beautiful music!
2) HDR and 4K graphics!
3) Highly interactive!
4) One of the few Savannah-themed visual novels!
5) Play as multiple characters!
6) Boss battles!
7) Good dramatization!
8) In-depth plot!
In the case of MacOS and Linux users can not run directly from Steam, run through local files, keep in mind!
Also visit my website!
I hope for your support! I will do more global projects in the future! But without your help I won't be able to give you these projects! Take care of your family and friends with love Irbis!
I will also add! The game does not want to offend anyone, all the facts that seemed offensive to you are just fiction that in no way refers to real life! That's all for sure now! We wish you a pleasant purchase!

content_descriptors.notes: There's blood and marks of violence on the characters! Screamers! Well and dialogues there are rude words that are not suitable for children's audience!

detailed_description:
Savanna Story Diamond Edition - It is a non-linear visual novel with elements of drama. The action of the game takes place in 2012! Savannah is on the brink of war! The fate of Savannah is in your hands! Was inspired by the game Lioness Story(Maltakreuz,Goodsir,Maxim Garagulin). This edition features absolute 4k and HDR graphics, you will be instantly immersed in Savannah! This edition features absolute 4k and HDR graphics, you will be instantly immersed in Savannah! Benefits of Savanna Story Diamond Edition:
1) Beautiful music!
2) HDR and 4K graphics!
3) Highly interactive!
4) One of the few Savannah-themed visual novels!
5) Play as multiple characters!
6) Boss battles!
7) Good dramatization!
8) In-depth plot!
In the case of MacOS and Linux users can not run directly from Steam, run through local files, keep in mind!
Also visit my website!
I hope for your support! I will do more global projects in the future! But without your help I won't be able to give you these projects! Take care of your family and friends with love Irbis!
I will also add! The game does not want to offend anyone, all the facts that seemed offensive to you are just fiction that in no way refers to real life! That's all for sure now! We wish you a pleasant purchase!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS + Linux
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz / Athlon® XP
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB ОЗУ
  • Storage: 1,62 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15.7
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz / Athlon® XP
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB ОЗУ
  • Storage: 1,62 GB available space

name: Savanna Story Diamond  Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 на х64
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz / Athlon® XP
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB ОЗУ
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1,62 GB available space

reviews:
“is a captivating game with impressive graphics and an engaging storyline. The sound design is top-notch, adding to the immersive experience. The game offers hours of fun, with challenging levels )”
recommend – OFEN

“A non-linear visual novel, drama and boss battles in Savannah. Highly interactive, beautiful music and deep story. Play as multiple characters and influence the fate of Savannah in 2012!”
recommend – GooD-PaRaZiT
short_description: The fate of Savannah is in your hands!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
